paragraphs: The ancient nisswo in the Argonian village told me I'd find the happiest, most musical frogs in all of Blackwood within the ruins of Vunalk. He also told me to beware the resident nereid. She's apparently known for imparting curses on anyone who ventures too deeply into her lair.
I'm sure that once she sees how devoted I am to my craft and how talented I am as a musician, she'll be more than happy to let me adopt a few of the frogs that live in the ruins.
